alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 6:03PM EST until December 28 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...The southern Adirondacks, Lake George Saratoga region, and Washington County in eastern New York, and for Bennington and Windham Counties in southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and walking surfaces due to a light accumulation of snow and ice. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation should begin as snow and sleet later this evening, before changing to freezing rain or freezing drizzle after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
